news_header: Hamas demands a permanent end to the war and rejects temporary ceasefire proposals.
news_text: Hamas, represented by leader Taher al-Nunu, insists on a permanent end to the war in Gaza, rejecting any temporary ceasefire arrangements. The organization calls for the withdrawal of Israeli troops, the return of displaced individuals, adequate humanitarian aid, and a serious agreement on prisoner exchanges. Recent talks aimed at establishing a ceasefire included proposals for hostage exchanges and increased aid to Gaza, but Hamas maintains its position for a lasting resolution.
